unnormalised: Wow, these athlete biographies are fantastic! Reminds me of "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag"! Knowing Mary Kom's struggles or Dhoni's early days in Ranchi gives such perspective. Makes you appreciate their dedication. Imagine training in the heat of Rajasthan or competing at the National Games. I wish they included more on the NIS Patiala coaching experiences too. Really inspiring stuff!
